configItem.name: loglen
configItem.description: Specifies the maximum number of xpl messages to store in the log file.

configItem.name: lpath
configItem.description: Specifies the path where the log file will be saved.

configItem.name: xml
configItem.description: Specifies the name of the log file.

configItem.name: xsl
configItem.description: Specifies the name of the xsl file that transforms the xml log file. Leave blank for no transform.

configItem.name: out
configItem.description: Specifies the name of the output file created by the xsl transform. Leave blank for no transform.

configItem.name: comport
configItem.description: Specifies the serial port to which the X10 computer interface is connected. This should be the numeric port number only, i.e. 1, 2, 3 etc.

command.name: Transmit X10 command
command.description: Transmits an X10 command on the powerline.

element.name: device
element.label: Device
element.conditional-visibility: command=^(On)|(Off)|(Dim)|(Bright)|(All lights on)|(All units off)|(Extended command)$

trigger.name: X10 Command Received
trigger.description: Occurs when an X10 command is received from the powerline.

element.name: house
element.label: House code
element.conditional-visibility: command=^(All lights on)|(All lights off)|(All units off)$
